projects.title: Bond Ladder
projects.description: Built out a Bond Ladder tool one of the clients we were working with. This project was a lot of fun as it was a duo project with me and another front-end engineer. This project was closely tied to multiple shareholders as they wanted to push this project out within a month of its start date.

projects.title: Qubit
projects.description: Qubit is a SaaS kiosk program which interfaces with the user and the Autostore's grid system. Some of the noteable features I worked on within Qubit while employed at Autostore was a new inventory system implementation for clients with larger output & a complex cycle-counting inventory system.
